title: Back to the Future: Caleb Ewan Wins First WorldTour Race in Three Years, Sam Bennett Continues Resurgence
content:
Two former alpha sprinters continue to return to form in 2025 with wins in Basque Country, Pays de la Loire.

Read the full article at Back to the Future: Caleb Ewan Wins First WorldTour Race in Three Years, Sam Bennett Continues Resurgence on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
